price: そして、もし（復活を）噓呼ばわりする、迷った者の類いだったのであれば、
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ ٱلضَّآلِّينَ

version.title: Japanese translation - Saeed Sato
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Japanese by Saeed Sato. printed in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna mina al-mukadhibīna al-ḍālīna
